statements: SELECT * FROM discussion_forum;
SELECT forum_name, created_on FROM discussion_forum;
SELECT forum_id, forum_name FROM discussion_forum ORDER BY forum_name DESC;
SELECT forum_name, created_by FROM discussion_forum WHERE created_by = 'Alice';
SELECT forum_id, created_by, created_on FROM discussion_forum WHERE created_on > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM discussion_forum WHERE created_by = 'admin';
SELECT forum_name, created_by, created_on FROM discussion_forum WHERE forum_id = 'abcd-1234';
SELECT forum_id, forum_name FROM discussion_forum WHERE created_by = 'user1' ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT forum_id, forum_name, created_by FROM discussion_forum WHERE created_on > '2022-01-01' AND created_on < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY forum_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT created_by FROM discussion_forum WHERE forum_name LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY created_by ASC;
SELECT * FROM discussions;
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_description FROM discussions;
SELECT created_by, created_at FROM discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE discussion_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, created_by FROM comments ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM discussions WHERE discussion_id = 1
SELECT discussion_topic, created_by FROM discussions WHERE discussion_topic LIKE '%database%'
SELECT * FROM discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT discussion_topic, COUNT(*) as total_comments FROM discussions JOIN comments ON discussions.discussion_id = comments.discussion_id GROUP BY discussions.discussion_id
SELECT * FROM discussions WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM discussions;
SELECT title, creator_id FROM discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message_text, sender_id FROM messages WHERE discussion_id = 'abc-123';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY sent_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, creator_id, created_at FROM discussions WHERE creator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT m.message_id, m.message_text, m.sender_id, u.username FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.user_id;
SELECT d.title, d.created_at, u.username FROM discussions d JOIN users u ON d.creator_id = u.user_id WHERE d.created_at > '2022-01-01';

SELECT d.title, d.created_at, COUNT(m.message_id) AS total_messages FROM discussions d LEFT JOIN messages m ON d.discussion_id = m.discussion_id GROUP BY d.discussion_id HAVING total_messages > 10 ORDER BY total_messages DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM instructors;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) as total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_comments > 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM instructors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;

SELECT students.name AS student_name, instructors.name AS instructor_name, post_content, comment_content FROM posts JOIN students ON posts.student_id = students.id JOIN instructors ON posts.instructor_id = instructors.id LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM threads WHERE thread_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT post_id, user_id, created_at FROM comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, description FROM threads WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT post_id, content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY updated_at ASC;
SELECT count(*) AS like_count, post_id FROM likes GROUP BY post_id HAVING like_count > 10;
